com.vmware.vapi.protocol.server.rpc.http

Interface StaticContentService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StaticContentServiceImpl

    public interface StaticContentService
extends Service
    A Service for serving static content/files. Instances should be registered in the usual way using Server.setServices(com.vmware.vapi.protocol.server.rpc.http.Service[]).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.vmware.vapi.protocol.server.rpc.http.Service

        Service.TransportGuarantee

    • Method Detail

      • setContentBase

        void setContentBase(org.springframework.core.io.Resource contentBase)
                    throws IOException
        Set the static content base.
        Parameters:
        contentBase - Resource representing the static content base; should be backed by a file
        Throws:
        IOException - if the resource cannot be resolved as absolute file path (not available in a file system)

      • getContentBase

        org.springframework.core.io.Resource getContentBase()
        Get the static content base.
        Returns:
        Resource representing the content base

      • getContentBasePath

        String getContentBasePath()
        Get static content base as absolute path.
        Returns:
        String representing the path

      • setDirListing

        void setDirListing(boolean dirListing)
        Parameters:
        dirListing - true to enable directory listing.

      • getDirListing

        boolean getDirListing()
        Returns:
        true if directory listing is enabled
